me.lihq.game.screen

Class NavigationScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lihq.game.screen.AbstractScreen
      • me.lihq.game.screen.NavigationScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class NavigationScreen
extends AbstractScreen
    This is the screen that is responsible for the navigation of the player around the game. It displays the current room that the player is in, and allows the user to move the player around between rooms.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean captureFrame
      Polled to check whether to capture the current frame into recentFrame
      ConversationManagement convMngt
      This is the main ConversationManager that controls the conversation mechanic
      PlayerController playerController
      The controller that listens for key inputs
      com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image recentFrame
      This stores the last frame before the game switches to another player, and is used for the background of the playerSwitchScreen
      SpeechboxManager speechboxMngr
      This is the SpeechboxManager for the main game
